content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":89571,"originalJapaneseLine":"CITYにキバ子の悲鳴が響き渡った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kibako's scream echoed throughout the CITY."},{"lineNumber":89572,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":".........."},{ "lineNumber":89573,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":89574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐすっ……ぐすっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sniff... sniff...\""},{"lineNumber":89575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほ、ほーら、キバ子ちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He-Here you go, Kibako-chan."},{"lineNumber":89576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日は頑張ったから晩ご飯はお肉たっぷりだよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"You worked hard today, so tonight's dinner is full of meat.\""},{"lineNumber":89577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":89578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………ぷいっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........Pui!\" (Turning away)"},{"lineNumber":89579,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あうっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Agh!\""},{"lineNumber":89580,"originalJapaneseLine":"しばらくキバ子は人間恐怖症になった。","translatedEnglishLine":"For a while, Kibako developed a fear of humans."},{"lineNumber":89581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、なにをしてるんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, what are you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":89582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Lord Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":89583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、うっ、うっ♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, ugh, ugh♪\""},{"lineNumber":89584,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの部屋には、シィルとキバ子がいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"In Rance's room were Sheila and Kibako."},{"lineNumber":89585,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言葉のお勉強です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We're studying words.\""},{"lineNumber":89586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What?\""},{"lineNumber":89587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ついにキバ子と言葉で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Finally, we might be able to communicate with Kibako in words."},{"lineNumber":89588,"originalJapaneseLine":"　意思疎通が出来るようになるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can we really understand each other?\""},{"lineNumber":89589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、そうかも知れません」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that might be the case.\""},{"lineNumber":89590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずっとキバ子ちゃんとお話してみたいと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've always wanted to talk with Kibako-chan,"},{"lineNumber":89591,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思っていたので私も嬉しいです」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I'm happy too.\""},{"lineNumber":89592,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねー、キバ子ちゃん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Kibako-chan?\""},{"lineNumber":89593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、う、う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U, u, u...\""},{"lineNumber":89594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぉーあー……うぉーあー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wo-ah... wo-ah...\""},{"lineNumber":89595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「先は長そうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Looks like there's a long way to go.\""},{"lineNumber":89596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あはは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ahaha...\""},{"lineNumber":89597,"originalJapaneseLine":"数日後――","translatedEnglishLine":"A few days later—"},{"lineNumber":89598,"originalJapaneseLine":"緊張の面持ちでキバ子がランスと相対していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kibako faced Rance with a nervous expression."},{"lineNumber":89599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、キバ子ちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay, Kibako-chan."},{"lineNumber":89600,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様に言葉が喋るところ見せてあげて」","translatedEnglishLine":"Show Lord Rance that you can speak words.\""},{"lineNumber":89601,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh...\""},{"lineNumber":89602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんか……こっちまでドキドキしてきた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Somehow... I'm getting nervous too...\""},{"lineNumber":89603,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぴっ、とキバ子がランスを指さす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kibako pointed at Rance crisply."},{"lineNumber":89604,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ra...\""},{"lineNumber":89605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh...\""},{"lineNumber":89606,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラ、ンス……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ran, su...\""},{"lineNumber":89607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh!\""},{"lineNumber":89608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス……ランス……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance... Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":89609,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………すき」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I like you.\""},{"lineNumber":89610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おお……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh...\""},{"lineNumber":89611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ、どうやらこれが言いたかったみたいです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe, looks like that's what she wanted to say.\""},{"lineNumber":89612,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":89613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　可愛い奴め、うりうり！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha! What a cute one, uriyuri!\""},{"lineNumber":89614,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが乱暴にキバ子の頭をなで回す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance roughly patted and ruffled Kibako's head."},{"lineNumber":89615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………うう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Uu.\""},{"lineNumber":89616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh!\""},{"lineNumber":89617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oops.\""},{"lineNumber":89618,"originalJapaneseLine":"キバ子は嬉しそうに","translatedEnglishLine":"Kibako happily"},{"lineNumber":89619,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの胸にしがみついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"clung onto Rance's chest."},{"lineNumber":89620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、すき」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance, I like you.\""},{"lineNumber":89621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむうむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mhm mhm.\""},{"lineNumber":89622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すきすき。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Like, like."},{"lineNumber":89623,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス、すきー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, like you—\""},{"lineNumber":89624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":89625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　もしかして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Could it be...\""},{"lineNumber":89626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ、実はまだこれしか喋れなかったり……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe, actually, this is all she can say so far...\""},{"lineNumber":89627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、この調子なら一ヶ月後には","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But at this pace, within a month,"},{"lineNumber":89628,"originalJapaneseLine":"　随分と喋れるようになる筈ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"she should be able to speak quite a bit.\""},{"lineNumber":89629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほほう、楽しみだなそれは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh ho, that's something to look forward to.\""},{"lineNumber":89630,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: CITYにキバ子の悲鳴が響き渡った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kibako's scream echoed throughout the CITY.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は頑張ったから晩ご飯はお肉たっぷりだよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You worked hard today, so tonight's dinner is full of meat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくキバ子は人間恐怖症になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For a while, Kibako developed a fear of humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの部屋には、シィルとキバ子がいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Rance's room were Sheila and Kibako.
"Finally, we might be able to communicate with Kibako in words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意思疎通が出来るようになるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can we really understand each other?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ずっとキバ子ちゃんとお話してみたいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've always wanted to talk with Kibako-chan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思っていたので私も嬉しいです」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Looks like there's a long way to go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緊張の面持ちでキバ子がランスと相対していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kibako faced Rance with a nervous expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に言葉が喋るところ見せてあげて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show Lord Rance that you can speak words."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか……こっちまでドキドキしてきた……」
ぴっ、とキバ子がランスを指さす。
「えへへ、どうやらこれが言いたかったみたいです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe, looks like that's what she wanted to say."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　可愛い奴め、うりうり！」
ランスが乱暴にキバ子の頭をなで回す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance roughly patted and ruffled Kibako's head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの胸にしがみついた。
「えへへ、実はまだこれしか喋れなかったり……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe, actually, this is all she can say so far..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、この調子なら一ヶ月後には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But at this pace, within a month,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 随分と喋れるようになる筈ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she should be able to speak quite a bit."
"Oh ho, that's something to look forward to."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
